name: Redirect External Links(Back Links)
author: Kanhaiya

sections.description:
This plugin purpose to help on page and post redirect and set rules. User can set redirect for custom url too.

Some Website Use your credits power to sell their products and they put incoming links to your website to show buyer or internet user that Your Website is their customer, This plugin helps you to tell those Customer that
linked website cheating and you are not responsible for those purchase and links. This plugin will help your SEO Creditability and Customer value.

Plugins Provide Excellent Feature of Redirects.
1)Show Complete List of Incoming Traffic with URLs
2)You can Select that website URL and Set Rule for Users.
3)Set 404 or Restricted Page for Users if they came from fake sites.
4)Set 301 Redirect, Some websites are good for getting traffic like Online selling site and news sites, You can land users to different different landing pages.
5)Set Custom Page , You can Select WordPress Built-in pages and allow user to redirect that page, ex:- http://example.com/page1 put your website URL to show as customer or their user.So whenever Any Customer click and come to website admin can see which customer come from which website and set custom Page to tell that That Website doing Fake Propaganda

Contributors & Developers

This plugin manage and handled by the author itself.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

1.Upload the entire Back link tracker Plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
2.Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress.
3.You will find \’Backlink Tracker\’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.faq:
What is the use of Plugin?

There are lots of plugin available for redirect purpose, same way it works , you can set the custom status for URL using this plugin.

How many type redirect status we can set using this plugin?

There are mainly 3 types options available currently , 301 Redirect , 404 and Custom redirection (External links).
sections.changelog:
Plugin is compatible with latest release of WordPress 5.7.
Updated the jQuery inline script tag attributes..
